attributes.description:
The Ford EcoSport is a solid compact SUV, and remains a popular choice. What makes the EcoSport a great all-rounder, is that it has decent ground clearance and compact dimensions, allowing for easy entry and exit, as well as tackling those gravel roads with ease. The EcoSport is powered by Ford’s four time award winning 1.0T turbo engine, providing outstanding performance and fuel consumption.  In this Titanium Spec, the EcoSport is equipped with all the bells and whistles, like semi-leather interior, climate control, cruise control, PDC front and rear, and even satellite navigation to mention a few. 

Balance of Ford’s 4 year / 120’000km warranty.

Don't Miss Out, Call Us Today, or Leave Your Details and We Will Call You.

Finance Can Be Arranged, Nationwide Delivery, Trade-ins Welcome.

Price Excludes Documentation and Registration Costs E&OE

As one of the many Motus Select Pre-owned dealerships, we pride ourselves in excellent service and offer vehicles that can be trusted and enjoyed. Customer satisfaction is our main priority! 

MOTUS: Live, Love, Drive.
